function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for environmental context in relation to frequency of visiting green areas may lead to skewed results and ineffective policies.","Impact":"Policies and management strategies may not address the actual needs of the population, resulting in underutilization or neglect of green areas.","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to understand the specific environmental factors that influence frequency of visiting green areas. Develop policies that consider a holistic approach to the use of green spaces, taking into account both personal attributes and environmental contexts.","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring and data analysis technologies can be used to assess the impact of environmental factors on green space utilization.","People":"Population at risk of experiencing ineffective policies and neglect of green areas due to skewed data analysis.","Owner":"Research institutions, urban planners, and policymakers."}]}
